name: fs-typescript
description: Repository for Part 9 (TypeScript) of the Full Stack open course

scripts.calculateBmi: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/bmiCalculator.ts

author: Yannick Hagedorn
